phy_active: This variable controls whether or not the instance is currently "active". Setting it to false will prevent the instance from participating in the physics world, and setting it to true will have it participating again. Please note that this is not the same as deactivating the instance, as the instance is still visible on the screen and can still be changed through code, rather this function just prevents it from participating in the physics simulation
